page.title: 13Cheriton Fitz. Employment
page.content: {Mixed farming}is the most important occupation. Some sheep and cattle are grazed, but dairy herds have have been been reduced. There are several self- employed builders, motor mechanics and handymen.{Commuters}to Exeter,Crediton and Tiverton include several School and University teachers as well as professional and skilled workers in commerce and industry.{Redundancy}hit two breadwinners, but they got fresh jobs.{Young people}get jobs with difficulty. In{1945}there was 1 Blacksmith, 2 Butchers, Hairdresser, Ironmonger,Harness Maker, Saddler, Sweetshop, 2 Tailors and an Under- taker. All these have gone, except the Village Stores & Off-Licence, which stocks almost everything except fresh meat and fish.
